Posts.Content: kt2009 wrote: Hi i am after abit of advice i am only 22 have had two kids, i noticed a lump on right breast about 5months ago i went to doctor and she just said because of my age it will be a cyst or something and go away itself she was not very helpful but i thought she was right, it is still here it does not hurt at all dont even notice it it is not very big, but the last month i have had a very bad cough very weesy and my back of my neck is really hurting/aching so last night i was rubbing my neck and i have two little lumps on left side of neck could this be anything to do with each other or am i just panicing?? what do you think it could be? they dont hurt at all either hard like on breast??Â  pease help me, thank you very much.
